sentences.sentence: Message in, message out, perhaps with protocol or format mediations applied.
sentences.translation: 消息的传入和传出也许会用到协议或格式中介。

sentences.sentence: Deploying the mediations into one or more run-time environments.
sentences.translation: 将中介部署到一个或多个运行时环境。

sentences.sentence: Existing custom mediations do not require any modification to work.
sentences.translation: 现有的自定义中介不需要任何修改即可工作。
